messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Everyone welcome Gigglesworth our new HOS

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: So apparently we have 2 HOS and to decide which one stays we will hold a match in bar

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that one of the station's [REDACTED] has developed lizard level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Everyone, I was called to centcom for some important business so I have to leave right now. While I'm gone HOP is the acting captain.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The RD is dead, can't say more

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: So yeah, power works, just dont play with it. Otherwise it wont. Also RD is dead.

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: So i just had a great big idea, there is no such thing as a nuclear disk to protect if there isn't one in the first place.  Also we have issues with SM. We may be boned. MAY be. Luckily my best men... man is helping out. Diving into the Sm blows shit up. We know that now. Frontier science. Haha. No seriously we may die.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: A  moment of  scilence  for the brave,  yet incompitent engineering team

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Due to your incompetent CE your SM has delemated all of us here at centcom has pressed F ceremonisously for respects

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: SM has in fact blown up. I know that after attempting to fix it, having a metal girder fly through my stomach rendering me deaf and high. I am seriously injured and somehow survived. God, i must be in hell.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: there is a bomb at the docks you have 30 seconds to disarm the badmin bomb
